Summary: The front desk associate on the night shifts was unprofessional, rude and racist, she has no clue about customer service, HER MAME IS DEBRA OR DEBORA ( not sure on the spelling) from the beginning she was rude at check in; the minute she heard my accent. from there, she was calling on the phone, about my pet that was left in the room for 20 minutes, that was her excuse calling me and yelling at me  to come back to the hotel otherwise she would call animal protect, she was very rude and mean taking to me as if she was talking to a child, she was very racist from the way she was looking at me when we checked in. I’m not sure what a racist woman is doing behind a desk when the most important thing is on her role to give the best customer service experience to the guests no matter
Room tip: Debra, the front desk agent is a racist and mean woman, with no clue about what customer service...

Summary Heading: Seal Beach for convenience and comfort
Summary: Beach, ease to 405 and all things in the Seal Beach neck of the woods made this hotel a perfect location. The drive to downtown Seal Beach is less than 5 minutes away. Visiting family in Long Beach and finding Restaurants for dinner was a breeze. Comfortable, priced right with complimentary breakfast and free parking made this Hampton Inn a fine choice for a quick wedding weekend from Northern California.  Plus Southwest and Long Beach airport are so easy to traverse.

We just spent 10 nights here and everything was wonderful, friendly staff, nicely appointed rooms, excellent breakfast choices. We will definitely be back! It is close to Seal Beach, Los Alimitos & Long Beach.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in OC
Summary: We have started traveling to OC and are looking for a nice place to stay. We've stayed at the Hyatt House in Cypress, but there are several problems with their guest rooms that didn't agree with us. We found those problems to be non-existent in the Hampton Inn in Seal Beach. We appreciate that it is pet-friendly and close to most everything we go up there for. I'm sure we will be staying there again, and I know we will enjoy it as much as we did this past wknd.

We had a 2 queen bed room on the 3rd floor. Beautifully remodeled rooms with gray/whitewashed flooring and modern decor (wish I had time to take photos but it was a quick overnight trip).  Pros: -Quick check in (we did the HHonors digital check-in and got 2 physical key cards when we arrived) -Free breakfast  -Comfy bed -Mini fridge in room  -Clean, updated room -Walking distance to Starbucks, Subway, sushi, and Denny's  Cons: -The bathroom had a foul sewer smell and the toilet clogged after the 2nd use (seemed like a low-flow toilet) so we had to call the front desk.  However, they were able to take care of the clog while we were out to dinner.   If we end up staying here again would love to bump this up to 5 stars if the bathroom smells fresh!
Room tip:
Fitness center hours are 6am to midnight 

Free parking lot

Summary: This is our third stay here in two years.  It is the best deal from Long Beach to Huntington Beach  It is not in a busy area, just one mile north of Hwy.1  in Seal Beach.  The room was very clean with a TV and a real nice selection of channels and a quite wide screen. Refrigerator in room but no microwave. Gotta go down stairs to heat food. No big deal. Two screen window blocking shade in room. Only thing I would recommend to Hilton would be two grab bars in shower, side and back. Secondly the doors slam shut whenever people enter/leave  and they are heavy.  and noisy  The A/C was easy to figure out on the wall thermostat.

We stayed at this hotel whi le visiting in Long Beach. It is in a pretty utilititarian spot, but was far more affordable than the Hyatt we'd stayed at before in Long Beach. It's not really a great walking area, but a short drive to downtown Seal Beach and to LB. The staff here were all very professional and very nice. My wife uses a wheelchair, and the accessible room was well designed. All in all, it was a good stay and I'd recommend this location.

Easily accessed of 2nd Street or Seal Beach Blvd. and not far from the Pacific Coast Highway.  Plenty of parking, and safe, in the area.  Close to a couple of places to each.  Staff was great.  Rooms were very clean and well maintained.  Only issue was an unusually uncomfortable bed for a Hampton.  Generally Hampton beds are super comfy, but this one was not.  Be sure your windows are fully closed - traffic noise.
Room tip: Suggest the rooms on the parking lot side due to road noise.

Summary: Tagged along on spouses biz trip - LOVED this hotel!!  Location is EXCELLENT!  Lots close by & easy fwy access.  They offered us house-keeping - OMG, didn't know that was even possible anymore!  We had a large, first floor King sofa bed - it was huge & had a lot of space - seating area, big desk, comfy bed, wet bar area & nice closet & bath!  (like a one-room suite!)  My only criticism is the breakfast - not that much choice or offerings, but it was still offered & appreciated.  Wish they started earlier, as my spouse has to be at work at 6 a.m.  (there is a Starbucks in the parking lot). I would stay here again w/o question!!
Room tip: get a King w sofa bed

Summary: Getting worse. Horrible pillows, bed sagged. Unfriendly desk clerk. One waffle machine not working, location is wonderful, Seal Beach is a lovely beach town, wonderful restaurants near the beach. Easy access to freeway. Unfortunately not up to Hilton Standards

The room was clean nicely set up with microwave refrigerator iron board n iron the sofa was comfortable  . I would stay here again and recommend it to friends n family . The breakfast was great , the variety of food was a good choice , bacon n eggs waffles cereal yogurt and fresh fruit

Summary Heading: Great location for Leisure World visits
Summary: Great location for our purpose, very accommodating staff, clean and comfortable. Just what you’d expect from Hampton Inn. I would suggest checking your internet access with the front desk before going to your room to be sure you can access the private setting.

Our son was on base nearby and this hotel was convenient for us. The staff that checked us in was able to accommodate our early check in request and he did it promptly! Thank you for accommodating to my family and being able to be close to our son’s location made it worth it. Thank you.

This hotel let us get our room early , the room was clean and the staff was nice and friendly. The breakfast was fresh and delicious . The rooms were very clean and quiet , the television was large with great selection of movies.

Wouldn’t have given this hotel a 5, but breakfast had neither orange juice or fat free milk.   Very friendly staff, room service available, clean rooms, heated pool.  Located in beautiful Seal Beach close to the water, restaurants and shopping

I have stayed at this Hampton many times.  The check in staff is efficient and personable.  Even though this location is near a busy street, it is very quiet.  We were upgraded to a King Suite.  It was very nice!

This hotel was a great place to stay it was clean and comfortable and parking was easy to check in and check out process was fast and the workers were friendly. I would recommend staying here and work stay again.

Summary Heading: The bed is very uncomfortable. The shower is outdated and the water comes out poorly
Summary: The quality of the room was just OK. The bed was very uncomfortable hard. The pillows were flat like pancakes. The bathroom shower was very outdated. It looks like they tried to update it but forgot about the shower. The housekeeper knocked on her door twice before checkout. I think she was in a rush to clean the room. It was very annoying. Wasn’t even close to 11 AM.

This is the second time we have stayed at this property and it is great! I’m a Diamond Hilton Honors member and I stay on points frequently. I really feel that this is the best Hilton property that I have stayed at. We travel throughout southern California, mostly in Anaheim, Temecula, San Diego, Redondo Beach and here. We’ve also stayed in Reno and Miami.   The staff here are friendly and helpful. The rooms are spacious and clean. The pillows are perfect! The A/C is not too loud and it doesn’t get overly cold then too warm.   The breakfast is wonderful and they are offering the waffles again, as well as the warm items like eggs and bacon, along with the variety of muffins, bagels, cereal, and yogurt.   We didn’t use the pool or fitness center, but they were open. The parking is

Great atmosphere and staff very pleasant. Really was happy to allow us to check in earlier than our original time of check in. Also there was a little pop up clothing store it was great. Our room Was great. Just wish it smelled a little better.

Hotel is in good location. Restaurants  in walking distance. Rooms are clean. Needed a waste basket in kitchen area. Clerks checking you in, are friendly and helpful. Breakfast was okay. Coffee was good.

I had an issue with my reservation and called the hotel to see if it could be resolved. The person on the initial call made the change to my reservation and told me I was all set. Fast forward to the weekend of my stay and I see that nothing had been changed in my HH App. When I call the hotel back the person I spoke was extremely confrontational I even had to prove I made the initial call, which I was able to do by pulling my Verizon phone log. Not only did they not help me they made me feel like a liar. Needless to say I’ll never stay at this property again and furthermore I will not be staying at a Hilton property again anytime soon.

Nice hotel.  Good location for us since we wanted to drive to different S Cal beaches.   Breakfast included.  Hot coffee available all day. Clean rooms and comfortable beds.   Very pleasant front desk workers.   Loved the digital key on my phone.

Summary Heading: Nice clean hotel close to Seal Beach and all amenities.
Summary: Great hotel, clean with friendly staff and a hot breakfast.  You cannot go wrong with this hotel.  The location is perfect for access to beaches but also very close to freeway access.  I have stayed at this hotel for years and am always impressed with the cleanliness and friendly staff!

The services provided for the cost of a motel room were simply not acceptable.  We had to exchange our own towels and finally ask for housekeeping to clean our room and replenish our amenities after the 3rd night.   Would not recommend this motel.

Last minute trip, great location, close to the city but far away for it to be quiet in the evenings and nights.  My room was very spacious and the bed was very comfortable.  Quiet guests at night and even though I had a first floor room I was unable to hear anyone above me.

We had a small issue in the room, but the issue was resolved right away! Great communication with the front desk. Super close to Seal beach pier. Beautiful visit, even added an extra night last minute!

The hotel was clean breakfast and as good, close proximity to amenities in area, we stayed in one  of the rooms that had already been updated so there was nonissue i. That respect. There is good security as you cannot access without hotel room keys.

Stayed here because there was a convention in nearby Anaheim so hotels in the area were upwards of $600 / night. Seal Beach was the closest area to Disneyland (within 15 miles) that was affordable, so I spent one night here, mid-week.  This is an old school, standard-issue Hampton Inn. It has the very old, dated interior decor style, but I'm sure it's only a matter of time before the property will be renovated and updated. It's not run-down by any means, but the plain green carpet and dark furnishings give it a ho-hum feel.  My ground floor room was clean and smelled fresh. The linens were in good condition and the bed was comfortable. I really love that the hotel still has the old INNCOM thermostats, which are easy to hack so you can keep your room super cool by doing a bypass

Stayed one night to visit friends. Extremely clean and very aware of the pandemic. We felt 100% safe The staff was very helpful and accommodating  Close to lots of dining choices. Just a 10 minute drive to Belmont Shores for restaurants

We stayed at this hotel only 1 night, it is a good location with many restaurants around, and they provide a free breakfast with a good choice of hot food and free coffee all day. There is a pool, and you could go a nice walk to visit the surroundings.

Summary Heading: Quick Trip to Long Beach to Visit Daughter
Summary: Love the area. Hotel is quieter than most as its slightly off main highways. Visited Seal Beach, Long Beach, Huntington library and botanical gardens, and Joshua  Tree national forest. All within a 1-2 hour drive.

This is a very well run hotel. The staff are attentive, sincere, and overall excellent. This was not my first trip here, not will it be my last. I have, and will continue, to recommend this property to anyone travelling to Southern California

Manager was very accommodating. Great start to great stay! Room was clean and beds were very comfortable. Breakfast was yummy and the variety was endless. Location was perfect...close to the airport.Thank you!

The hotel was nice and clean.  The beds were comfy and we slept well.  Close to Seal Beach Pier but would have been a long walk (about a mile).  There are few eating places near, and is not on the beach, but are a short ride.

I grew up in Seal Beach, and come back to visit as often as we can. We try to stay at this property every time, because the price is reasonable, the rooms are always clean and comfortable, and the location is great. I wish someone had alerted me that my Hilton Honors points expire, so all the stays were essentially wiped out to 0 points. That was a nasty surprise.   Also, be prepared if you have food allergies to accommodate your own needs. Ask specifically for a fridge in the room. I called two days in advance to ask if their breakfast had gluten free/dairy free items. In the past, other Hampton properties have graciously provided soy or almond milk, eggs without milk in them, etc. Or if a property can't, they are at least apologetic and kind about it. When I called 2 days in

I love staying in the Junior Suites every time I come to Hampton Inn Seal Beach, It is quiet, beautiful, excellent service, always clean, delicious breakfast.it is a walk away from the beach,,           ...Starbucks is in the parking lot.

From the check and to check out, this was a great pleasant surprise. The professionalism and cheerfulness of the front desk was very appreciated. The room Was clean and spacious and decorated well. And check out was a breeze. I will be back
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review.  We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!  We hope to be your hotel of choice here in the Seal Beach area, and we look forward to your return!

Summary: We had to stay for my son's hockey in Long Beach so I was just looking for something nearby with free breakfast. When I stay at a Hampton Inn I know what I'm getting and always happy with it. It's clean, nice rooms and lobby, close to what we needed, staff is friendly, and you get a full breakfast. Definitely would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to your return, and hope to be your hotel of choice here in the Seal Beach area.

Summary Heading: Shout out to Cindy & team at Seal Beach Hampton Inn & Suites
Summary: For over 10 years, I have had a very consistent experience with Cindy & team in Seal Beach. The staff, location, price and cleanliness of Hampton Inn & Suites in Seal Beach keeps me coming on average 8 times per year.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your review, and your continued patronage.  I will definitely celebrate your comment with Cindy and the team!  We hope to continue being your hotel of choice here in the Seal Beach area, and we look forward to your return.

Summary: We always try to stay at this location when visiting children/grandchildren.  Location is good, staff are helpful, amenities are home-like comfortable, clean, and reliably consistent. Haven't tried the breakfast but folks seem to be satisfied with it.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time and sharing your review.  We are very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us, and your continued patronage.  We look forward to your return!

Summary: Family visit ... we chose this hotel because it was in proximity to our family.. also we are partial to Hilton  properties .. we have chosen this location because we have had favorable success at this location
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us, and we hope to continue being your hotel of choice here in the Seal Beach area.

Summary: Decent accommodations for the money and available last minute! The room was clean, the beds were comfortable, and the staff was pleasant. We enjoyed the free breakfast which included some hot items. The waffles are always a favorite and the eggs, sausage, and oatmeal were tasty and much appreciated.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.  We hope to be your hotel of choice here in the Seal Beach area, and we look forward to your return.

Summary: This Hampton Inn is perfectly located for easy access to both Long Beach and Huntington Beach. Slightly off beach keeps traffic to a minimum, and near great restaurants, freeway access, and a Whole Foods.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are very happy to hear you enjoyed our location and your stay with us.  We hope to be your hotel of choice here in the Seal Beach area and we look forward to your return.

Summary: This property is expensive for a Hampton, so I had hoped that the hotel would be above average, but I was disappointed. The room was good and spacious. However, the window shades (which were very necessary because of the bright sun) had holes in them. There is no microwave or mini-fridge. I asked about this at the desk and they said only "junior suites" came with these. Very disappointing. The breakfast was typical Hampton. The location is ok. There is no good place to eat very close. The beach is not too, too far - maybe a 10 minute drive. A 10-15 minute drive the other way has strip malls, fast food and chain restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  I apologize you were disappointed with your stay.  I appreciate your candid comments, and we are working on renovation on all our guest rooms early next year.  We hope for another opportunity then, and provide you the kind of accommodation and service we pride ourselves with.

Summary: We tried to check in early and they said we couldn't.  When I explained to the lady at the desk that I booked through the honors program, she said, " I don't know why they keep telling people that they can check in early". With A HUGE ATTITUDE.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  I apologize for your experience.  Please feel free to contact me directly if you would like to discuss further.  I would like to get more information from you and the employee that you had dealt with.    As far as early check-in, it is based on availability, regardless the booking channel you booked with.  We try our very best to accommodate requests, but sometimes it is a bit of a challenge.  But at the very least, we should have been able to communicate that with you in a professional and kind manner.

Summary: Very disappointing. No honors rewards upon arrival. Hotel is dated and is in need of a major renovation in the halls and rooms. No fridge in room! Worst part was a constant shaking of the middle of the building caused by housekeeping laundry machines. It felt like an earthquake. The staff was rude when I mentioned it and said "yea we get that complaint alot"... Well how about addressing it. Worst stay at a Hilton brand hotel I've ever had. Would never stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  I apologize for your experience.  It is very disappointing that we were not able to provide you with the kind of service pride ourselves with.  Rest assured your concerns will be addressed accordingly.  As far as the hotel itself, we are planning a renovation early next year.  This will include putting a refrigerator in all the rooms.  We hope for another opportunity to make a better impression on you.

Summary: Wanted a hotel close to Seal Beach. Was bit of a walk however not terrible. Hotel was clean and area was welcoming. Can't go wrong with free breakfast. Check in and check out was easy. Close to Del Taco and Dennys Subway and Starbucks.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We hope to be your hotel of choice here in the Seal Beach area.  We are looking forward to your return.

Summary: The room was clean, large and well appointed.  The front desk staff was friendly and informative.  The hotel is in a safe neighborhood, but it's between two large roads which made for some loud road noise at times.  But, there was no safe in the room, nor was there a refrigerator.  For the price we paid, we kind of expected some amenities.  Overall a good experience though.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Renovation, including putting a refrigerator in all the rooms are in the works.  Early next year is our target start date.  Also, we do have safes available at the front desk.  We hope to be your hotel of choice here in the Seal Beach area, and looking forward to your return.

Summary: Great Location.   Clean Room, Staff was very helpful and made me feel welcome.   I have stayed at this Hampton Inn last year an had a good experience so I was traveling for business and came back for another good stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We appreciate your return, and hope to continue being your hotel of choice here in the Seal Beach area.

Summary: As always l, the stay was well worth the price. I do recommend it to anyone tracking to this area. I did enjoy the breakfast, helped start my day. The room service/cleaning was top notch. Definitely will stay again
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We appreciate your patronage.  We hope to continue being your hotel of choice here in the Seal Beach area.  We  look forward to your return.

Summary: We have been staying at this Hampton Inn three times a year for the past 10 years.No need to look for any other place to stay in this area.  Every staff member from Cindy the manager to the breakfast hosts are a pleasure to interface with.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you so much for your patronage, and your kind words.  We hope to continue being your hotel of choice, and look forward to your return.

Summary: So there are fast food places around the hotel, Starbucks is right out the front door. I believe there was an Asian restaurant in front as well. Denny’s is on the corner. Laundry machines were nice to have available.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We hope to be your hotel of choice here in the Seal Beach area.  We are looking forward to your return.

Summary: A few technical problems but I found the hotel staff very pleasant, quiet room & dining area clean, conveniently located, safe, but not pleased with pricing. Only a few days notice had me paying significantly more than 10 day notice.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We hope to be your hotel of choice here in the Seal Beach area.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: My wife and I live in Arizona and visit our daughter every month. We stayed at this location because it is near our daughter's home. There wasn't a refridgerator in the room. The breakfast was awful. The eggs tasted like powered eggs. Service was horrible. There was only one person in the breakfast area to help. The water container was empty, the skim milk was empty, fruit was gone, only one toaster and a long line as it was a Sunday. No bacon, sausage or hash browns like every other hotel. The representative that checked us out was rude and didn't bother to ask how our stay was or have a great day. Like she was doing us a fovor checking us out. Will never go to a Hampton again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time you share your review.  I apologize for your experience.  It is disappointing that we were not able to provide you with the kind of service we pride ourselves with.  Rest assured your concerns will be addressed accordingly.

Summary: Love this place! Near some neat handy places! Had Mani-Pedi, walking distance, yummy Del Taco just steps away, Complimentary Breakfast is top notch, fresh, clean, and always refilled if low!  The atmosphere rocks and the coffee is off the scale!! You guys rock!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us, and we so appreciate your kind words.  We hope to be your hotel of choice here in the Seal Beach area.  We are looking forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Great access to Seal Beach area
Summary: Great access to Seal Beach area. Business meeting with Boeing made this location a perfect option. Facility was maintained well and complementary breakfast was very nice. Room was clean, with nothing showing wear. Great stay.

I would definitely recommend Hampton and suites. Very clean comfortable and non smoking Hotel.  Breakfast was good, the service was good. Very nice and clean place.  Gloria, the cleaning person, super nice:):)

Everything was as expected. I appreciated how quiet it was, the comfortable bed, and the extra large jetted bath tub. I also used the pool while I was there and it was clean and inviting. I was visiting family in Long Beach and it was the perfect home base.

Nice and clean place to stay. The entrance is really weird because it is hard to find the driveway, but once you are there it is a good set up. The coffee in the lobby is appreciated and was actually pretty good.

The customer service is excellent at this location, as well as the complimentary breakfasts.  The location is very convenient for traveling to appointments and the airport and also to the beach to decompress.  For the money, in the area, it's pretty good value, but I'd expect a little newer accommodations for this price point, also.

This Hampton Inn in centrally located near the I-405 and CA- 22 and I-605. Service at front desk was excellent as upon our early arrival they did not have any rooms ready but called me when one became ready less tha one hour from our arrival. The suite was one of the cleanest in the many Hamptons that I have stayed. Our cleaning girl was so determined that it was perfect, and I thanked her with a card and large gratuity. Food was also very good and had better than average assortment.

Summary Heading: Clean and centrally located to beach
Summary: This hotel offers spacious and clean rooms. They have a pool if you like to swim. We always stay at this hotel when visiting family and friends in the OC. It’s about a mile from there beach and a couple of miles to the 405 and Garden Grove freeways. There’s convenient fast food and restaurants including Starbucks next door.

Standard for chain. Hotel workers were friendly and helpful. The breakfast area was large. The breakfast items were typical but no meat option on the first day. The room was an average size and the bathroom was nice - large, up-to-date.

Needed to take break and relax so Idecided to book a room. My room was beautiful and comfortable. When I arrived they had HOT Chocolate chips cookies at the check in desk. What a treat. The location is very nice  and safe. Will be back!!

Summary Heading: Friendly staff Good location LAcked fridge
Summary: The staff was very friendly and tried to be helpful. the rooms to do have fridges or easily accessible power. breakfast was crowded and many items ran out for a considerable period of time. The place was clean

When I arrived, I didn't get a warm greet. More of a snotty attitude. I was then told the room was 243 with taxes, but my reservation showed at 212. I didn't say anything but luckily the charge was reflected and I was reimbursed (without having to call, thank you for fixing this). I am not sure if the lady was new, but I felt the situation was 'bait and switch' since I needed a room. I do stay at Hamilton hotels so I know this is not a normal occurrence. Hotel was clean, good free breakfast, and in a good location.

This Hampton Inn was really a good one.  The rooms had a fridge and microwave, and the beds and pillows were excellent.  Great breakfast, fitness center, and the internet was easy.  The rooms were spacious, quiet, and clean.  Plus, plenty of towels!

Summary Heading: Comfortable Stay Away From the Crowds
Summary: We stayed here because of its proximity to the hosts of a wedding we were in town to attend. The hotel is fairly remote from the usual tourist stops in nearby Long Beach save for a few chain restaurants and a Starbucks. Without a car or an Uber App. The walk into town is  around two miles.   The hotel itself is warm and welcoming with a nice outdoor pool, fitness room and business center. One of the two treadmills was out of order but there wasn’t a rush for equipment do availability was a non issue. Beds were comfortable and room was easy to climate control. Charging stations for electronics were on the desk and only one nightstands. This was a problem when each of us wanted to charge our phones near the bed.  Also, the shower head has an adjustable spray control but because

Summary Heading: Great value in the Seal Beach area
Summary: We have family in the Seal Beach area and we stayed at this property while visiting. Excellent location that was close to everything we wanted to do. The free breakfast is a great benefit and the food and coffee were great. Clean rooms; friendly staff; and a great price for the area.

Good location with plenty of parking. Coffee and food nearby. Room a suite 403 was a little outdated and need to be remodel. The staffs are very helpful and very pleasant to talk to. If you are a Hilton Honor they will accommodate you with snacks and room upgrades, if available.

This hotel is a good midpoint if you are trying to visit several beaches during a stay. We did Huntington Beach two days and Long Beach one day and of course Seal Beach. Good location to LGB airport too.

The Hampton Inn at Seal Beach was a great spot for our family - great location and easy access to the Beach, Knotts Berry Farm and other spots.  This was a nice, clean hotel and the breakfasts were a notch better than the average hotel breakfast.  Enjoyed the fresh juices!

We were able to check in early which I appreciated. The location was close to the ocean and where my mother lived. The breakfast was good. It included a lot of fruit which I appreciated. The staff was very helpful.

Summary Heading: Pleasant Accommodations in Laid-Back Seal Beach
Summary: Very convenient freeway access, plenty of safe parking. Quiet, well-maintained hotel near nice suburban neighborhood with easy access to gorgeous beach & great casual restaurants. Hotel breakfast okay - not great. Meager vending options.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay to visit friends and family in Seal Beach or Long Beach
Summary: We had a great visit with family in Long Beach with the Hampton Inn as our home base.  The location was convenient to our family and local freeways/attractions. The staff was great, and our accommodations and food were good.

rooms were clean, food was good (coffee too!) and the staff was friendly and helpful - would stay here again! Close to the beaches and we were played games in the guest area without any trouble - thanks!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your review.  We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.  We hope to be your hotel of choice in the Seal Beach area, and look forward to your return!

Summary: This hotel was very comfortable and clean. The staff were wonderful; caring & attentive. The breakfast was not that great really, but for a low price hotel, it was sufficient. It was noisy the night we stayed there because the parking lot behind our room was being pressured cleaned. Lucky us!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review.  I'm so sorry to hear about your experience.  I hope this will not deter you from coming back to our hotel.  Please feel free to contact the hotel directly the next time you stay with us, and we can maybe help find a quieter room location for you. We do hope to see you back!

Summary: Not bad and not great - just a pretty standard hotel.  Price was a bit high for a standard hotel, but it is in a beach area so that should be expected.  Breakfast was a nice touch.  Location was great for what we needed but otherwise, we probably won't return.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review.  If there is anything we could do to be above standard, or anything specific we can address for you, please feel free to contact the hotel directly.

Summary: Great location, central to pretty much everything.  Rooms were pretty out dated, pillows not very comfortable and no fridge. The room was very clean however as well as the bathroom.  Enjoyed the complimentary breakfast was fresh and hot every morning as well as delicious coffee. Enjoyed the pool area, nice pool hot tub a little grimy in need of a good clean and some work. Front desk was hit and miss, some very friendly staff and a few In the morning very rude.  Overall was happy for the location and cleanliness would probably stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We're pleased to hear you enjoyed our location, and rest assured we will address your concerns accordingly.  Please feel free to contact me directly if there is anything else you would like to discuss further.  We hope to see you back again!

Awesome team members very friendly and courteous. The room was AMAZING!! loved the decor the ambiance and the homey feel.Wireless was awesome!! DigitL key was awesome too!! Summary: The staff is so friendly and helpful. Hotel is always clean and quiet. The location is great for Seal Beach or Huntington Beach. I stay at hotels every week and this is one of my favorites.  Beds are super comfortable too!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of the hotel and staff!  We get a lot of guests that travels a great deal, and we try our very best to be their home away from home.  Thank you for making us one of your favorite hotel, and we hope to continue providing you the kind of service we pride ourselves with.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Relaxing place to say with eclectic surroundings
Summary: I have stayed at this hotel twice in the last two years for an annual high school sporting tournament. In both stays the staff have been courteous, attentive and accommodating. This last stay the hotel experienced a power outage and the elevators were not working, but the accommodations were clean, spacious and pleasant. The location of the hotel is a bit interesting. There is a stock broker, nail spa, other mom and pop businesses in the same block and the hotel is adjacent to a fast food restaurant. I would like to see a cocktail hour for hotel loyalty club members.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  I do apologize you experienced the power outage with us, but I'm glad the staff was able to provide you good service.  Thank you for being a Hilton Honors member, and maybe the brand will consider having a cocktail hour in the future for Hampton by Hilton. We love having you here, and we hope to see you back soon!

Summary: My husband and I were visiting family in Long Beach and decided we wanted a night to ourselves.  After researching various Hampton Inn locations in the area, we selected this one at Seal Beach.  It was the best decision.  The facility is in a good location close to restaurants and the ocean.  We were upgraded to a king suite which was very large, comfortable and clean.  The bed was extremely comfortable and we did not notice any noises.  Staff was very friendly and accommodating.  The complimentary breakfast was decent with a little something for everyone.  The only two things I noticed was that the parking lot was small and the drain in our tub was clogged but both were minor issues to us.  I'd highly recommend this hotel and exploring Seal Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review.  We are very pleased that you and your husband enjoyed your stay with us.  We hope to be your hotel of choice when in the area, and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Really one of the best Hamptons!
Summary: We're not even done with our stay, but I have to give a great review! The desk staff has been very pleasant and helpful every day. They called multiple cab companies to get quotes for a cab ride to the airport for us. I have a particular pet peeve about hotel breakfast buffets. They usually are not careful to make sure that the hot water carafe never contained coffee. Here at the Seal Beach Hampton Inn and Suites, every day the hot water is hot and does not taste like coffee. They have a good selection of hot and cold breakfast items, including two waffle irons. Our beds and pillows have been very comfortable. The maid service is excellent. They do have a guest laundry with laundry soap and dryer sheets available for purchase at the front desk. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are very happy that you had a pleasant stay with us.  We appreciate the team's recognition, and we are glad that we were able to provide you the kind of service we pride ourselves with.  Thank you for your patronage, and recommendation.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Clean and comfortable room, bed/mattress was great, complementary breakfast have great selections. Parking availability as great even though arriving late night. Starbucks across the parking lot is a big plus. Definitely will use it again if in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review.  We are very happy that you had a great stay with us.  We hope to be your hotel of choice when in the area, and we look forward to your return!

Summary: Generally a nice hotel in a good location but I found several sub-par issues. First the air conditioner was extremely noisy. I thought I could sleep through it but found I had to turn it off. Second, the internet access was available for Hilton Preferred members, but when I had forgotten my password. I went through the hoops to reset it and it told me to check my Email. Obviously that's not possible without internet access. Luckily the staff gave me a free pass. The hotel has no bar which was disappointing since the football playoffs were in full swing and we were mid-game. Finally the complimentary breakfast I found to be sub-par.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  I apologize for the AC.  Please don't hesitate to let Front Desk know right away for that type of concern. We can definitely check to see what we can do to fix it for you.  Unfortunately, we don't have a bar.  Hampton by Hilton are focused serviced hotels, we don't have a restaurant, or bar in the property.  We are however, only a couple of miles away from downtown Seal Beach, and there are plenty of great sports bars to choose from, and it is a nice little town.  I know sometimes your schedule may not permit it, but the staff will be more than happy to recommend or suggest alternatives for what we may not have at the hotel for you.  We hope to see you back!

Summary: Overall clean and welcoming place.  Don't expect a nightcap or a reasonably good restaurant though!  This is a 12 Step practitioner's dream.  However, the rooms are clean and in good repair, the staff helpful and friendly and the breakfast (with the exception of the ready-made cheese "omelets") was good enough to get one out the door!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review.  We are happy that we were able to provide you a nice, clean room and friendly service.  We are a focused service hotel, we don't have a restaurant or bar on property, but we are close to downtown Seal Beach that has great establishments, and there are places that delivers.  We can try and assist with suggestions or alternatives for what we may not have at the hotel.  We hope that this does not deter you from coming back, we would love to be your hotel of choice when in the area.

Summary: For anyone visiting the Boeing Seal Beach facility, this is a perfect location to work.  You are only about 2-3 miles from Main Street and the shopping areas on PCH in Seal Beach which has many restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review.  We hope to continue being your hotel of choice when in the area, and look forward to your visits!

Summary: If you have not stayed at this property yet, make sure to stay here. Best hotel in Seal Beach Ca. will be back again thanks to the staff for everything they did for us very helpful and always greeted us and made us feel like at home thank you once again!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review.  We are very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us, and we hope to be your hotel of choice here in Seal Beach!

Summary: Everything was as expected, the location to restaurants is good. Parking is a breeze. Used the free complimentary internet service, it was grear. Did not try the free breakfast on this trip because we slept in most mornings.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are very happy you had a good stay with us.  We hope to be your hotel of choice when in the area!

Summary: I've always slept well when I've stayed at a Hampton Inn. I've always awoke well rested, that's the most important thing to me, other than the smell of the room in a hotel. The staff was very attentive and accommodating.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are very pleased that you had a well rested stay with us, and that our team was attentive and accommodating to you and your needs.  We hope to be your hotel of choice when in the area, and thank you again!

Summary: Poor research process worn carpets and elevators in repair help was generally good but booking was a nightmare wish the staff was not so constrained with corporate nonsense and regulations that make the process awkward at best
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  I do apologize for your experience.  Please feel free to contact me directly if you would like to discuss it further.  I hope that you would give us another opportunity, and show you the kind of service we pride ourselves with.

Summary: I found the staff and the facility to be clean, comfortable and pleasant to be around.  The cleaning service provided was timely.  I would like to have had a refrigerator in my room.  Overall I would recommend Hampton Inn Seal Beach to family and friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review.  We are very happy that you had a pleasant stay with us.  We hope to see you back soon, and hopefully be your hotel of choice here in Seal Beach.

Summary: Love staying at this facility.  Great location, staff extremely helpful, rooms and lobby are very clean. I come here because the location is close to my family and friends when I come to visit.  Would recommend to all my family and friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are very pleased that you enjoy staying with us, and we hope to continue being your hotel of choice.

Summary Heading: A Diamond In the Rough, Henry!
Summary: After a stressful check in in which we almost weren't able to check in even though our reservation was prepaid for in full earlier in the day & we were advised that we could check in & that everything was all set, all we needed was ID (boy were we in for a surprise!), we got to our room which at first glance was ok. But on closer inspection I noticed layers of dust on furniture, in corners and in drawers, the bathroom was not very clean, the furniture was ugly & outdated, reminding me more of a nursing home than a hotel &  there was a funny smell throughout the hotel. If the appearance wasn't bad enough, this was one of the most unfriendly hotel staffs I had ever encountered! They were short & blatantly rude at times! Never intending to return to this  property, I stayed away
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  I do apologize for your experience.  We do have standards we adhere to as far as the cleanliness of the hotel.  I apologize if we fell short on that, as well as the customer service you received.  Please feel free to contact me directly, and hopefully provide more specific information from your stay, so that I may address it accordingly.  Thank you for praising Henry.  He is a definitely valued employee, and I am pleased that he at least made an impression on you.  I hope this will not deter you from giving us another opportunity, and show you the kind of service we pride ourselves with.

Summary: My stay at the Hampton Inn and Suites exceeded my expectations. The staff were warm and welcoming. The desk chair was out of this world comfortable  . The room was more spacious than the millenium falcon.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are very pleased we exceeded your expectations.  We hope to be your hotel of choice when in the area, and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great stay prior to a cruise
Summary: The hotel staff are excellent, very friendly and helpful.  We arrived around 10am after a flight from Las Vegas.  Whilst we didn't expect our rooms to be ready till 2pm we were offered breakfast which we appreciated.  The receptionist took all our luggage and put security tags on it.  The rooms were soon ready and we were impressed with them.  A large, very comfortable bed.  Nicely furnished and very clean.   Good selection of good quality toiletries and a note in bathroom saying if we had forgotten anything to ask at Reception.  There is tea and coffee available to help yourself in Reception all day long.  Lovely swimming pool and jacuzzi with chairs,  tables and sunloungers. Access is through a secure gate using your room card.  Location is good with nearby eating places such
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words.  We are very pleased you enjoyed your stay with.  We hope to be your hotel of choice when in the area, and we look forward to your return!

Summary: A good hotel with competent staff and clean rooms.  It is very convenient to Long Beach Airport and allows me to handle all my meetings in the Huntington Beach, Seal Beach and Long Beach area without using a freeway.  The location and service keep me coming back.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are very pleased you enjoy your stays with us.  Thank you for returning, and we hope to continue to be your hotel of choice.

Summary: Very easy to use the reservations system online. Out-of-the-way for Seal Beach, but easy to get to. Breakfast was disappointing and the Internet connection continually kicked me off. Bed comfortable. Check-in person was pleasant. Clean, good enough, but overall ok.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  I apologize if breakfast and your internet connection was disappointing.  If there is anything specific you would like to share, please feel free to contact me at the hotel.  We strive to continually better our hotel and services for our guests, and any feedback could only help us to hopefully provide you a perfect rating on your next stay with us.

Summary: Great Hotel for family getaways!!!! We stayed there for our trip to California for Thanksgiving never had a bad stay at this Hotel. If you need a reliable Hotel with a kind staff at your beckon call stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review, and kind words.  We hope to continue being your hotel of choice, and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Overall experience was good however bit pricy per location and attraction nearby... It was convenient to attend things nearby however not many leisure activity nearby.  Breakfast was decent. Room were clean but bit smaller then expected studio. Additional bedding was not available for sofabed initially however provided later.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  There aren't a lot of walking distance attractions by our hotel, but we are only a couple of miles away from the beach.  Long Beach and Huntington Beach are only 10-15 minutes away (driving.)  Front Desk can definitely assist you with the area, just let us know.  Thank you again for your review, and we are happy that still had an overall good experience with us.  We hope to see you back.

Summary: I highly recommend this hotel! Staff, room, breakfast, and location is great! We never have any problems with the check in & out, the staff make it so efficient and non stress!  We traveled with our autistic son and the staff are very accommodating, which is amazing!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words!  We hope to continue being your hotel of choice, and we look forward to your return!

Summary: Great place. Comfortable bed and pillows. Love the ceiling shower head and size of shower. Breakfast was awesome. Made my own waffles and can choose which type of juice I wanted (I love food). Great sitting area to eat. Great staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  It is with such pleasure knowing you have enjoyed your stay with us.  We hope to see you back soon, and thank you for choosing us for your hotel accommodation.

Summary: The hotel is located near major roads and has ample parking. The staff is very courteous and efficient. The breakfast provides healthy options.  Room was large, well appointed and very clean. The pool was excellent. We would not hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  Nothing pleases us more than knowing we have provided excellent accommodation for our guests.  Thank you for the choosing Hampton by Hilton- Seal Beach, and we hope to continue your hotel of choice.  We hope to see you back soon!

Summary: Located just a short distance from the 405 Freeway and in a quiet area with a strip mall with convenient eateries. The Seal Beach area has a lot of attractions near the water as well as some very nice restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are glad that you enjoyed our location.  Thank you for staying with us, and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I booked a room here for 1 night due to the Ayres was booked solid. I have stayed before at Hampton Inn and loved it. I was disappointed rooms do not have mini fridge. The following day I was preparing to leave and pulled back the sheets entirely and discovered the the blood/brown spots on the fitted sheets at the end of the bed where the you place your feet on. I was grossed out and immediately called the mgr.. She did come to the room and was also grossed out. She did refund me the night and apolgize. No apologies. Please train the housekeepers.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  I apologize for your experience, and it is being addressed accordingly.  It is not the kind of impression we want to leave you with, and I do hope you give us another opportunity to show you the kind of service we pride ourselves with.

Summary Heading: A decent hotel with amenities you'd hope fro when traveling
Summary: We stayed for a few nights.  The outdoor pool was right next to the parking lot, but it is fenced in, heated, and also had a hot tub.  The hot breakfast each morning was nice to come downstairs to and not worry about having to drive somewhere.   Coffee was available in the lobby all day, and in the afternoon, a plate of chocolate chip cookies was by the check in counter.   We stayed on the 4th floor. The water pressure wasn't strong, but good enough for a shower.  There is both free wi-fi, and for purchase.  We'd stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are very happy to know you all enjoyed your stay with us, as well as our amenities.  We hope to be your hotel of choice when in the Seal Beach area.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The hotel was perfect for business travel.  The rooms were very spacious, clean and quiet.  Good desk space for doing business.  Good internet access.  Easy parking.  Friendly staff.  Breakfast buffet was very good.  Easy walking distance to the Boeing facility.  Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review, and thank you for the opportunity to provide your hotel accommodation. We are very happy that we were able to meet your expectations and we will definitely count on you return!

Summary: This was an "ok" hotel but nothing special.  The breakfast was adequate but places I've stayed offer a better variety of breakfast selections.  The smoking areas were to close to the entrance doors and smoke could be smelled in my room also there was an odor of bug spray in the room.  Would I stay again?  Probably but only because it's close to where I can visit with friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  I apologize if we were not able to meet your standards during your stay.  I hope on your next visit, we can show you the kind of service we pride ourselves with.  If there is any concern whatsoever, please let us know right away,  and we hope for the opportunity to make things right for you.

Summary: Stayed here on a quick overnight doing business in Long Beach. First, this is a typical Hampton Inn property. The rooms and common spaces were very clean, although the room carpet (green) will be do for an update in the next 12-24 months. Not poor condition, just a somewhat dated decor. Breakfast was typical. What was not typical was the front desk service offered. The staff was very kind, in particular Cynthia. I had many questions about drive times and routes to the Staples Center and she was so gracious and helpful. This was a good stay made great because of her warm smile and helpful heart. Thank you, Cynthia and team!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  I'm very happy that my team, especially Cinthia, was able to show you what we like to call "hamptonality!" Thank you for the opportunity to provide your hotel accommodation, and I'm glad that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We hope to be you hotel of choice whenever you are in the Seal Beach area, and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I always feel welcome at this Hotel. The staff is always friendly and our room is always clean. I love staying in these hotel because of the area. It is great to go biking or walking. There is a lot of places to eat and shop.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and kind words towards the team.  We are very happy you enjoy staying with us, and our location.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: MAIN COMPLAINT:  No compassionate stay/ bereavement rate
Summary: Very disappointed  that a Nationwide chain did not offer a Bereavement Rate. The reservation/ customer service  contact, English speaking, had never heard the word... It was a last minute reservation for a funeral so researching other places was not possible.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  My sincere condolences to you. As difficult as it probably already was making arrangements to go to the funeral, I do apologize if we made it even more challenging in any way.  We do offer other discounts and it is based on availability.  The day of your arrival, we had very little availability, and again I do apologize we were not able to offer any discounted rate at that time.  Thank you again for letting us know about your experience, and I will make sure to share your review with my team as well.  We hope to see you again, hopefully under better circumstances, and have the opportunity to be able to show you the kind of service we pride ourselves with.

Summary: This hotel is conveniently located to many areas of Long Beach that were on our list of reasons for the visit. The staff were all very efficient and polite. The room and all other areas of the hotel were very clean and well kept. The area is industrial, so don't expect a resort feeling. The price was right and good value for the money.  Complimentary breakfast was good, too. Loved the pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  I'm very happy to know you enjoyed your time with us.  We hope to be your hotel of choice when in Seal Beach/Long Beach area, and we are looking forward to your next stay.

Summary: Seal beach is a beautiful area near Long Beach and huntington beach,Ca. The hotel is nice and clean, though a bit pricey for the time of year I was there.the breakgfast, which is free, is just average.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review.  I'm glad you enjoyed Seal Beach, and our hotel.  We do tend to sell out throughout the year, our slowest season is around mid November-January.  As far as breakfast, if there is anything specific you would like to discuss further, please feel free to contact me directly at the hotel.  We do value your opinion, and if there is anything we could do better for our guests, we are definitely all ears.

Summary: I stayed here with my 2 kids and sister. Very close to Seal Beach albeit not within walking distance. Rooms were very clean, as well as the lobby area where they serve a nice continental breakfast in the mornings.  Coffee bar in the lobby was always fresh and well maintained.  Great place to stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review of our hotel.  We are very happy to know you, and your family enjoyed your stay with us.  We hope to be your hotel of choice when in town, and thank you again for taking the time to share your review.  We hope to see you all back soon!

Summary Heading: A very nice stay at a popular brand hotel.
Summary: I discovered this hotel in Seal Beach as great way to visit and perform business functions in both Orange and LA Counties. There are several highway and road alternatives available to us and a very short drive or brisk walk to downtown Seal Beach is another nice feature.  We have recommended this hotel to our family and friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are grateful you discovered our "home away from home!" We hope to continue being your hotel of choice, and please know how much we appreciate your recommendation.  Like the saying goes, "there is no greater compliment than a referral from a friend!"

Summary Heading: Our family has always stayed here !
Summary: Excellent, clean, pleasant, convenient, courteous - polite workers - it is close to where my family members live and so easy to get to areas - avoiding the busy highways - we went for my dad's 96 birthday celebration and were happy with the area and safety for people like us that are driving and parking at the hotel.  The outside is attractive and the hotel is easy to get to.  We have stayed there before with family and this visit was just as pleasant, and having the business center is a help, since we did not have current maps of the area, so we had convenience of a computer to use and did not have to bring our laptop.  The employees and visitors alike are very pleasant.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review!  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us, and we hope to continue being your hotel of choice in Seal Beach!  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Long day of driving that ended well.
Summary: Hotel and staff were top notch. Highly recommended.  Breakfast is very good.  I've stayed at this hotel 3 or 4 times and the service is always great. From the greeting to the time you leave the front desk is always asking if you need anything.  Really make your stay enjoyable.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your review.  We are very happy to know you enjoyed your stays with us.  We hope to continue being your "home away from home" here in Seal Beach, and we look forward to your return!!!

Summary Heading: Great hotel in a great area.
Summary: We were traveling through to San Diego. There is lots to do in the area plenty of restaurants. Great hotel great service great breakfast. The parking area fills up rather quickly. We would stay here again if in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  Nothing pleases us more, than knowing we were able to provide great accommodation and service to our valued guests!  We hope to see you back!

Summary: At $189 a night was not a good value. Had reservation problems that could not be amended and my HHonors membership did not get me very far to accommodate my situation. The AC/Heater unit smelled like cat urine when I turned it on. They really need to look into that. Great location to the Boeing facility and the beach. Downtown Seal Beach was close and easily accessible. Lobby area was very nice and great for meetings. Breakfast was pretty good.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  I apologize for the situations you have encountered, but rest assured it will be addressed accordingly.  If you need future assistance with our hotel, please contact us directly and we will do our best to accommodate your needs.  We hope to see you again, and hopefully have an opportunity to show you the kind of service we pride ourselves with.

Summary: Staff is very friendly and accommodating. Hotel is always clean and welcoming.  We love the warm chocolate chip cookies! :) convenient and close to all the entertainment.  Definitely will be coming back for mini vacations!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your awesome review.  We look forward to having you back!

Summary: Typically on our family events we are only interested in Hotels that offer a competitive price and complimentary hot breakfast.  This is by far the best we have found.  Would look for Hampton Inn & Suites when booking hotels.  Rooms were nice, bathrooms were clean...
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  We are very happy that we were able to meet you needs.  We hope to see you back, the next time you and your family are in town.

Summary Heading: Charming location, comfortable bed, and friendly staff!
Summary: Our group had an excellent stay at the Hampton Inn Seal Beach!  The staff were all very friendly and laid back, the rooms were comfortable, and the breakfast had healthy options.   I love Seal Beach too!  The shops and restaurants are charming!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are very pleased to know you and your group enjoyed your stay with us.  We hope to see you all soon!

Summary Heading: Don't count on the breakfast - Starbucks or Denny's are around the corner
Summary: We have used the Hampton brand several times without complaint. Unfortunately this stay was different. We planned a quick beach get away during Labor day weekend. This hotel is a quick 5minute drive to Seal Beach. Though the location is ideal the service of the hotel staff is not. Breakfast was the biggest problem. We arrived in the dining area at 7:45am the breakfast staff was at the front desk chatting amongst themselves. Basic items such as spoons, milk and waffle batter were no where in sight. When we questioned the staff for these items they were rude and unresponsive. They seemed inconvenienced by their job and in turn lost the loyalty of repeat customers.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  I apologize for your experience at breakfast.  I will definitely address it with the team.  Hopefully you will give us another opportunity to show you the kind of service we pride ourselves with.  Thank you again for your feedback. It is through comments like yours that we are made aware of areas we can improve on.

Summary: Drove all night stop for a few hours sleep mind you I had previously checked in and paid for my room when arriving girl at front desk very rude didn't give me directions on anything hotel where the breakfast was wanted to make sure that I knew that 12 PM was check out I work for a Hilton property I know when check out his thank you very much but other than that everything was good breakfast was good cleanliness was good but the girl at the front desk
Manager Response: I am sorry for your experience with one of my Front Desk Agent.  It is not the kind of impression we like to make with our guests, and definitely not one we like to leave you with.  Rest assure, it will be addressed accordingly.  Thank you for taking the time to let us know, and hope you will give us another opportunity in the future.

Summary: Very nice place and easy access to many places. Nice pier nearby and many shopping and eating choices. If heading go Long Beach or other cities close by, Seal Beach is a great little town. Easy access to other towns without getting on freeway.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us, as well as our location.  We hope to be your "home away from home" when you are in and around Seal Beach!

Summary Heading: Standard Hampton away from the crowd
Summary: I like this location; it's a bit out of the way in a quiet neighborhood.  Note, you may have to work your way through the traffic if you're coming in from downtown Long Beach via 2nd st.  There is a small trip mall in the same parking lot that has a Subway and Yasai Japanese Grill - so you're covered for quick eats.  Breakfast is the same as any other Hampton.  It's a bit out of the way from various places. but sometimes that's a good thing.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  We are quite a ways from downtown Long Beach, and 2nd Street can get pretty jammed during certain times.  There are definitely alternate routes, for next time, just let Front Desk know.  There are quite a few of us that is very familiar with Long Beach... but really glad you liked our location just the same.  Hope to see you back soon!

Summary: Always treated well while staying at the Hampton Inn in Seal Beach, CA. Great rooms and very well priced.  Staff are well informed of the area and present themselves as true professionals while representing the Hampton Inn organization.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  We are very to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.  We hope to continue to be your hotel of choice here in Seal Beach.  Thank you again, and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I stayed 4 nights on a business trip and all was very nice. Breakfast was great.  I would stay here again and recommend to others.  My family came with me and enjoyed the pool while I was working.  The hotel is located close enough to everything.
Manager Response: We are so happy you and your family enjoyed your stay with us, and there is no better compliment than referrals.  Thank you for that, and thank you for letting us know about your stay!!! We look forward to having you and your family stay with us again!

Summary Heading: nice location close to Long Beach
Summary: We stayed here as our hub before the start of school at CSULB. it was very convenient to the campus and Seal Beach is a nice quaint little town with a main street with nice eateries and shops. There is a Starbucks nearby and the hotel is bordered on two sides by major streets, so traffic noise is apparent.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  We are pleased that you enjoyed our location.  We hope to see back soon!

Summary: Great place to stay, rates are always reasonable. Have stayed here on multiple occasions. Convenient to Long Beach or Orange County. Complimentary Internet service is decent. Breakfast options are good, egg offering change daily and they have two waffle machines.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  It's always great to hear from our returned guests.  We look forward to having you back!

Summary: rooms nice size. Pool is small. location is ok. In a small shopping center. For you coffee fanatics Starbucks 100 feet away!! Breakfast was good not gourmet but enough to fill you up. if visiting LA keep in mind will be at least 1 hour away depending on traffic, some days was even more! just a few minutes to seal beach!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  We are happy to hear we were able to meet your needs.  Thank you for choosing our hotel, and we hope to see you back!

Summary Heading: Clean, convenient.... Room is a little sparse
Summary: Staff is courteous and helpful.  Parking is free in the adjacent shopping lot.  Breakfast is OK - fruit, cereal, make-your-own waffles, yogurt, pastries, muffins..... omelettes are cooked from frozen and you can tell. 24/7 coffee and flavored creamer in the lobby.  The room is smaller and has only (what I would call) a "courtesy" dresser (very small).   Clean, adequate bedding.  There's a Subway, Starbucks, and affordable Japanese restaurant within walking distance.  Small business center in the lobby area where you can use the computer and print your "stuff".  There's also a small, fairly well stocked and reasonable priced shop in the lobby for snacks, etc.  Overall a good value, and we would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  We are very happy to hear you had an overall good stay with us!  We look forward to having you back! Thank you!

Summary: We had a girl's trip out to Catalina planned and wanted to be close to Longreach for the ferry ride over. We had a great room for 4, two big queen beds and plenty of floor space.  Everything was up to the Hampton Inn standards, and we all had a great nights sleep.  We had to leave early but breakfast was available, and really pretty good. Everyone in our group enjoyed our brief stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  We're so happy to hear you and your group enjoyed your stay with us.  We hope to be your number 1 choice of accommodation when in the area!

Summary: Convient location better than average Pool in wind tunnel Breakfast average or less for price Clean room Comfortable bed Internet average Bathroom clean TV average Ambiant room temperature warm had to run ac
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  We are very happy to hear you enjoyed our location, and hotel.  We hope to see back soon!

Summary: Friendly staff, everything/where I saw/was on this facility was clean and well maintained. Breakfast area was cleaned and well maintained. Meeting room/area was ready and spot on at the appointed time.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review.  We hope to see you back soon!

Summary: This place is so nice and friendly. After moving & losing money on another hotel, this was so reassuring. Staff exceedingly friendly, great beds, TV and morning breakfasts. Will be using this exclusively during trips back to Seal.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel, and for such wonderful feedback.  I will make sure to share it with the team!  We look forward to having you back!

Summary Heading: Great Option- room for some tweaks
Summary: I was delayed an literally was booking this from 35,000 ft along with looking to stay in my company budget. Not something easy to do in CA.  It took me about 30 minutes from LAX at 1 am ,  6 minutes from VA Longbeach, which is where I was headed.  I was put in a handicap accessible room facing a stucco wall. Not that it mattered all that much at 2 am when I checked in. Had I been staying there longer it would have been a problem. They were not oversold so I am not sure why you put a diamond member in that room. Room was basic, bathroom had not been clean, even one of the towels look like it had been used and put back and my shower had not been cleaned. There was literally dirt that I thought was a worn out tub but it washed down the drain when I turned on the water. The towels
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel.  I apologize your room location was not to your liking, and for the linens and bathroom experience.  Rest assure it will be addressed accordingly.  Thank you for allowing us to improve on the areas we need to, and we look forward to having you back!

Summary: The entire staff has been most helpful. The front desk, Breakfast staff, House keeping and and maintenance staff have done everything possible to make my stay very enjoyable. I will always choose Hilton or one of their affiliates
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review!  I will make sure to share it with the rest of the team.    We hope to see you back soon!

Summary: Able to hear traffic noise until very late, so don't count on going to sleep until after 11pm, also the doors in this hotel latch like a bank vault so you'll hear people coming and going well into the night. Very expensive hotel at $235 on a Friday in Aug. Spent our second day looking for other more affordable and peaceful arrangements. Great location and very well appointed, ask for a room on the inside and not facing the traffic, might help some. Very clean too and great staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  I apologize you had a not so positive experience with your stay with us.  The hotel is situated in a bit of a unique location, with one side of the building facing a busy main street.  The room doors are fire doors, very heavy and with the hydraulic door closer, we will definitely check on that to see what adjustments are needed.  August is one of the busiest month for us, and our rates are typically a little higher.  Hopefully we can accommodate your hotel needs better in the future.  Thank you again for your review!

Summary: I have stayed at the Long Beach Hampton several times over the last few years.  My team books rooms in advance for a local dragon boat race and we know we'll have a good experience at this hotel.  The rooms are a nice size, very well-kept, clean (and I'm picky), and pretty quiet.  The staff is always helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel!  It's wonderful to know we have been yours and your team's hotel of choice. We always look forward to the Long Beach Regatta every year, and having the teams stay with us.    Thank you again, and see you soon!

Summary: Hotel was located approximately 1 mile off the freeway. Several restaurants were within walking distance, though more nutritional meals or greater variety required a drive. Huntington Beach Pier was only 10 to 13 minutes away. Lots of fun & things to do.

It was quiet, loved the bed.  Loved the coffee downstairs with the flavored creams .  Very clean room.  High quality sheets .  No charge for parking!!  The only thing was when I called to confirm my reservation my call ended up in a guest's room!!!  You need to check on your phone system.

We had a great time during our stay at Hampton Hotel. Overall it was a pleasant night and we enjoyed the hot tube. the location of the hotel was very convenience for the purpose of stay. very close to our destination.

Spent a Saturday night and Sunday morning in June at the Hampton Inn.  It's a modern chain hotel not a boutique which means no frills in return for a reasonable price.  The room was clean and quiet.  The breakfast buffet was acceptable.  There's a waffle iron which was fun.  Plenty of free parking.  I hate paying for parking with a passion.

I am a Hilton Honors member, so tend to gravitate toward Hilton Garden Inn properties, but came here on a package deal with Southwest. A great find!  Clean with wonderful breakfasts and hospitable staff.

Summary Heading: Room set up was impressive, but kind of outdated.
Summary: I was only here for one night so i don't have too much to say.  The room size was nice.  It had a lot of space. The bed was hard and pillows flat, and carpeting seemed outdated.  That's the worse i noticed. Not bad for one nights stay.

Summary Heading: Honestly don't know why this hotel has good reviews
Summary: Many problems at this hotel, it should not be in the Hilton brand. I can see why it is cheaper than others in the area after staying here. I called and requested a cot several hours before check in time (at least 9). I was told housekeeping would have it in the room. When I got there it wasn't in the room, so I stopped by the front desk while going to get another load of luggage. They guy said they had no record of it and would have to see if they still had one and would call me. 20 minutes later no phone call, so I called him and he said give them a few more minutes then a lady knocked on the door and a lady was delivering it. She said it was on the reservation but they missed it. We went down to the pool and there was no towels so my husband went to get some and also mention a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  I will definitely address your concerns with the team accordingly.  As far as our elevators, it is expired.  It expired December of 2017.  Unfortunately, we don't have any control over that.  The State is behind on their inspections, and they are aware of that.  We have an elevator company that does regular maintenance on our elevators, and safety is not an issue.  Please feel free to contact me directly if you would like to discuss further.  I tried searching for your reservation to look into this matter further, but I would need more information from you to find it.

Summary: The hotel was very accomodating to our extended family stay.  We had 35 people in our group.  They helped us we meeting space during evening gatherings.  Coming and going was fine.  The breakfast accomodations met the needs of our small children and while they sometimes made a mess the staff was polite and promptly cleaned it up.

Worked out well to attend a family friend's wedding nearby. Shuttle information from LAX would have ben helpful. There isn't much available to/from airports for Long Beach, CA. Ask for AAA rate rather than reserved for wedding rooms. The rate is about $10.-20. Less per night.
